name: GlShaderWith
description: A record of {@link BindGroup}'s used by the shader. `Record<number, BindGroup>` / export type ShaderGroups = Record<number, BindGroup>; interface ShaderBase { /** The WebGL program used by the WebGL renderer. */ glProgram?: GlProgram /** The WebGPU program used by the WebGPU renderer. */ gpuProgram?: GpuProgram /** A number that uses two bits on whether the shader is compatible with the WebGL renderer and/or the WebGPU renderer. 0b00 - not compatible with either 0b01 - compatible with WebGL 0b10 - compatible with WebGPU This is automatically set based on if a {@link GlProgram} or {@link GpuProgram} is provided. / compatibleRenderers?: number } /** A base interface for shaders that includes the common properties.

properties.name: glProgram
properties.description: The WebGL program used by the WebGL renderer.

properties.name: groupMap
properties.description: an optional map of how to bind the groups. This is automatically generated by reading the WebGPU program
